item.description:
The lead singer for this cover band is actually endorsed by Steven Tyler and Tyler (he met him when he won a look-a-like contest) referred him to his own personal vocal coach.  He studied uder Tyler's own coach for 10 years!  He's got the voice, the look and the MOVES down! 

About the band here:  http://www.drawtheline.net/#!__about

About Maddy's here:  http://www.maddyslounge.com/fr_home.cfm

$15 at the door! You can call Maddy's in advance if you want to but they said at the door is fine too. Band starts at 9:30 but arrive early if you want any kind of seat!
item.how_to_find_us: I will go early and TRY to get us a table area.... it will be crowded so standing may be the only option - just FYI
item.name: Aerosmith cover band "Draw the Line" at Maddy's in Saugus! $15 at the door
